INSTRUCTIONS: 
1) Make a copy of your save file before applying any of these codes. 
2) Create new save files for each navi you wish to use. 
3) Never apply the codes for multiple navis to the same save file, even if the previous navi's codes were removed before applying the new codes.



MegaMan SP
02001B81:00
02001C34:014F
02001CB4:17
